thread.title: Man Tries to Rape Woman in Salon After Going There for Massage, NYPD Says
thread.title_full: Man Tries to Rape Woman in Salon After Going There for Massage, NYPD Says

title: Man Tries to Rape Woman in Salon After Going There for Massage, NYPD Says
text:
Man Tries to Rape Woman in Salon After Going There for Massage, NYPD Says By Ben Fractenberg | March 10, 2017 6:33pm Twitter Facebook Email More 
QUEENS â€” A man punched and tried to rape a woman at a Flushing salon after going there to get a massage, police said. 
The suspect entered the business on 164th Street at about 4 a.m. Thursday before getting into a dispute with a 29-year-old woman inside, the NYPD said. 
He then punched the victim in the face and body and sexually assaulted her, police said. 
The suspect fled and the woman was taken to a local hospital in stable condition, police said. 
He was described as between 30 to 35 years old, standing about 6 feet and weighing 200 pounds. 
Anyone with information is asked to call the NYPD's Crime Stoppers hotline at 800-577-TIPS or for Spanish 1-888-57-PISTA (74782). The public can also submit their tips by logging onto the Crime Stoppers Website at www.nypdcrimestoppers.com .
